snippet.title: Swift Fun Algorithms #5: Reverse every other word
snippet.description:
Today we'll go over a very common question asked in a software interview.  Given a sentence string, implement a function that returns this same sentence with every other word reversed.  

As a bonus, I'll show you how to use an extension on the String class to remove all vowels in a string.

Completed source code:
http://letsbuildthatapp.com/2016/05/21/swift-fun-algorithms-5-reverse-every-word/

Follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/buildthatapp
